source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES 
  WHERE TABLE_TYPE='BASE TABLE'
  and TABLE_SCHEMA = 'DBO'

SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES 
  WHERE TABLE_TYPE='BASE TABLE'
  and TABLE_SCHEMA = 'pratica'
  and TABLE_NAME NOT like 'cunha%'

SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES 
  WHERE TABLE_TYPE='BASE TABLE'
  and TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dani'

activities.name: getting tables
activities.description: Obtendo tableas com o schema dbo

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES 
  WHERE TABLE_TYPE='BASE TABLE'
  and TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo'
--and NOT TABLE_NAME LIKE 'cunha%'

SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES 
  WHERE TABLE_TYPE='BASE TABLE'
  and TABLE_SCHEMA = 'pratica'
and NOT TABLE_NAME LIKE 'cunha%'
